categories: Category:Orko SkyMine Asteroid Processing Corporation products

nodes.text: Orko SkyMine Asteroid Processing Corporation was a fake corporation set up by Durga the Hutt. It was made to hide a huge amount of credits; the company was supposed to be a commercial venture to exploit the riches of the Hoth asteroid field, but in fact the money was being diverted to the top secret Darksaber Project.
